title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
created_time: April 02, 2023, 04:08:02 PMLast edit: April 02, 2023, 08:35:55 PM by JamesBorn
content: Naija is funny con3, drama and movies weh our Lidas dey take hus play. 3 months ago wos drama upon drama. Imagine 4rm issues of no money to pos wahala, from pos wahala to new money notes,Â  4rm new money to fake elections, afta elections everiti zoom off without any noise againNah who dey somewhere dey remote dis con3 like dis? Everywhere just dey silence now. Like this all the wahala don finish, I fear naija Lidas o.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: this topic is a low effort topic which i want you to lock this thread. And again try make your words to be understandable even me self dey find am difficult to read them all, even though we dey use 9ja pidgin abeg make e pure for me and any other person to read am through.My people say advise no be insult.
